name: haze
description: A WIP toy programming language, inspired by the best of TypeScript and C++

scripts.dev: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development bun run src/main.ts
scripts.perf: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development bun --perf run src/main.ts
scripts.inspect: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development bun --inspect run src/main.ts
scripts.build: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun build --production --compile ./src/main.ts --outfile dist/haze && bun run copylib && bun link
scripts.generate-parser: cd src/Parser/grammar && npx antlr4ng-cli -Dlanguage=TypeScript -visitor HazeLexer.g4 HazeParser.g4 -o autogen && cd ../../..
